body_html:
Correct, Dropbox has signed the corporate CLA, but I wanted to get confirmation from our open source team before proceeding.

My corporate account was just now added to the google group for the google corporate CLA, but I'm not sure if/how that state would propagate to my github account. (It is a member of the github dropbox team, so in principle the infomation is there.)

body:
Correct, Dropbox has signed the corporate CLA, but I wanted to get confirmation from our open source team before proceeding.

My corporate account was just now added to the google group for the google corporate CLA, but I'm not sure if/how that state would propagate to my github account. (It is a member of the github dropbox team, so in principle the infomation is there.)
